name: df-bj-tophom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ctophom, cmpo(s0, s1, ctps, ctps, crab(s2, co(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csethom, cfv(cbs, cv(s1))), wral(s3, cfv(ctopn, cv(s1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), cv(s3)), cfv(ctopn, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ -Top-> =(s0 ∈ TopSp, s1 ∈ TopSp ↦ { s2 ∈((Base ` s0)[-Set->](Base ` s1))| ∀(s3 ∈(TopOpen ` s1),(`' s2 " s3)∈(TopOpen ` s0))})
comment: Define the set of continuous functions (morphisms of topological spaces) between two topological spaces. Similar to ~ df-cn (which is in terms of topologies instead of topological spaces). (Contributed by BJ, 10-Feb-2022.)
